about_the_game:
*Game Overview



is the first work of the Bigtail Village village's emotional visual novel.
It consists of fun and moving narratives that users can enjoy while following one big story.

is game based on the original IP of Writer ELIN.

Starting with this work, will continue to produce visual novels as well as continuous subculture contents.

It's our first project, so there may be some flaws, but we'll do our best to create content that you'll enjoy.

*Game information



[Key factor: Story]
is for those who like emotional stories.

It's a heroine we've all dreamed of, a heroine who finds happiness in everyday life, but the overall story is funny and touching.

Enjoy the 's calming story.

[Key factor: Game]
provides an immersive experience through various CGs of the main characters.

does not have elements that target the main characters, but it is nonetheless prepared to make users feel likeable towards the main characters.

Enjoy memorable gameplay.

[Key factor: Sound]
will conduct full voice dubbing, and will also produce a luscious OST through a Bigtailvillage's vocalist.

Meet the sound that will entertain users' ears.

*Plat


The main character who lost his mother in a childhood accident.

He was wandering around longing for his mother

He came back to his hometown at his father's recommendation.

But the darkness of the heart doesn't go away easily...
It seems like he died without getting used to the scenery of his hometown that has changed a lot

In his life, he experiences something strange one day...!
The spring when flowers are in full bloom, which He planted in the yard of his house with my mother.

Suddenly, under the glowing tree, a girl stood.
And from this point on,

His life is beginning to be color once again.

name: How to turn a Cherry tree spirit into an idol

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy How to turn a Cherry tree spirit into an idol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 530
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 530

short_description: The protagonist who lost his mother in an accident and returned to his hometown with his father. Small town, countryside, and first-timers are all uncomfortable, and he faces an unexpected connection.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
